SELECT
from saas_collection_order
and order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and deleted = 0

SELECT sco.order_no orderNo, sbri.name, sb.mobile, so.real_capital realCapital, so.created_dt createdDt, so.repayment_dt repaymentDt, (CASE WHEN sobd.relation_order_bill_detail_id IS NOT NULL THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) extend, DATEDIFF(now(),so.repayment_dt) overdueDuration, sc.channel_name channelName FROM saas_collection_order sco LEFT JOIN saas_order so ON sco.order_no = so.order_numb LEFT JOIN saas_borrower sb ON so.borrower_code = sb.borrower_code LEFT JOIN saas_borrower_real_info sbri ON so.borrower_code = sbri.borrower_code LEFT JOIN saas_channel sc ON so.channel_code = sc.channel_code LEFT JOIN saas_order_bill_detail sobd ON sco.order_no = sobd.order_numb

select count(*) from saas_collection_order sco left join saas_order so on sco.order_no=so.order_numb left join saas_borrower sb on so.borrower_code=sb.borrower_code left join saas_borrower_real_info sbri on so.borrower_code=sbri.borrower_code left join saas_channel sc on so.channel_code=sc.channel_code
